sect2.title: Generating Date Strings Using toString()
sect2.para: The toString() method automatically formats the date object according to the conventions of the object's locale, or an optionally specified $locale.

sect2.title: toValue() - Partial Dates as Integers
sect2.para: To obtain an integer for some part of the date, use toValue($part).

sect2.title: get() - Partial Dates as Localized Strings
sect2.para: This method returns the $part of object's date localized to $locale as a formatted string or integer
